text: 11:2 Esekiel 40:17-20; Daniel 8:10; Luk 21:24; Akar Mogomem 12:6; 13:5Egh nɨ Godɨn Dɨpenim okarizir danganir dɨvazir ekiamɨn aven itim, an apanan markɨ. God Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamiziba danganir uari akuvir kam me ganɨngi. Eghtɨ marazi izɨ Jerusalem dɨkɨ mangɨ 42plan iakɨnibar tugham. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, nɨ anetakigh.11:2 Akar Mogomem 11:2ɨn faragha itir akam, nɨ Aposelbar Ingangaribar 21:30ɨn gan. Akar Mogomem 11:2ɨn akar igharazir kam, 42plan iakɨniba, da 1,260plan arueba, o 3plan azeniba gɨvazɨma uam akuam. Da 42plan iakɨniba ko magh ghue. Nɨ Daniel 7:25 ko 12:7ɨn gan. Nɨ akar Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamiziba Jerusalem dɨkabɨrazimɨn gansɨva, Luk 21:24ɨn gan.
